name: Bloody Garden
Description: A era of strife here in this time, monks who followed the ways of Buddha and his fellow brothers joined the religion one year before the order from the emperor. This order lead to the killing of the majority of Buddhist monks during the rule of the Qing emperor in the bloodbath had at the temples his brothers gave themselves up to the incoming aggressors now on a path for revenge he climbs the road of a blood monk to avenge his friends and his religion.
